title: Phonixmen
author: Phonixmen
content: Hello all.Offer Amazon vouchers on a regular basis.Payment by BTC,XMR etcI do not go first.the vouchers are not in stock! sending is usually within 24-96 hrs after payment. Please report only if you agree.Rate is: 1:0,85 , so you pay 85% of the voucher value, so you get 15% discount.To the procedure:1. contact me by PN and tell me how much you need. I will tell you if this is possible and how long the delivery will take.2. i send you my wallet address3. you pay4. after 24-96 hours you will receive your voucher(s)5. we both rate the tradeDiscordphonixmenxGreetings Phonixmen

comments.author: willi9974
comments.body: As always, the advice from me as a burned child, finger away!You all know why ... and if someone wants to know more precisely, like times after amazon / fraud / police / etc. search in the forum. Here there is no security with these coupons, they can ALWAYS come from a scam.In addition a new account which is only there to check out the coupons --> Date Registered: September 12, 2023, 06:20:41 PMThe only two postingshttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5466551.msg62834616#msg62834616https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5466547.msg62834431#msg62834431I'm leaving a negative trust as a warning to everyone here.If the account owner can somehow prove it that the vouchers are legit, I will delete the trust again.Many greetings from germanyWilli
